RATING 5.0 Curlys Chicken House Chicken, Fast Food 2100 Lake Rd, Elmira (607) 732-2334 LATEST REVIEW I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this restaurant!!! I always order the chicken&Bicuits&Gravy W/ Mashed potato's, and their Breakfast is awesome as well.. Stop by and try out this restaurant if your ever in the area, you wont be sorry, and you won't leave hun... REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 4.0 Hill Top Inn American, Fast Food 171 Jerusalem Hill Rd, Elmira (607) 732-6728 DESCRIPTION Elmira's Oldest licensed restaurant. Indoor/Outdoor dining overlooking the Chemung Valley. Quality American Cuisine. Easy access from Route 17. Only 1/2 mile from Elmira. LATEST REVIEW Hill Top Inn has been our favorite restaurant for years. The food is fabulous. There are different specials from the Chef every week and Wednesdays grill menu and tiki bar is alot of fun. Add all that to the spectacular view and pretty grounds and... REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
